testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update the Refund&Reason information with the specified ID number via the
testcase.name: The update of the desired Refund&Reason record via the API should be validated from the API.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/refundReasonDetails" path parameters...............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the refund reason 19 for which details are to be accessed, to send to the api refundReasonDetails endpoint..passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the response returned from the api refundReasonDetails endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the reason information in the response body is "Product arrived lately"..passed
